name: Geometry Dash Subzero (itch)
description:
INSTRUCTIONS

Use the Up key, Space or click to jump. Avoid the spikes and other obstacles and make it to the end of the level!
Advanced:
Press L to toggle animations, press B to toggle background, press V to toggle sound, and press P to pause.

-------------------------------A Game Made By Harsha----------------------------------------

It took like 3 days to make this game so  follow me if you like it.
